ca.utoronto.utm.shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.shapes.Shape
      • ca.utoronto.utm.shapes.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaintCommand

    public class Circle
extends Shape
    This class makes a circle shape. Circle gets a point that is the center of it. Circle has radius from the center of the circle. It has a color, a line thickness, and a boolean dictating if it's filled or not. Circle class also can paint it's current instance of circle.
    Author:
    CSC207 Group

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle(Point centre,
              int radius,
              java.awt.Color color,
              int thickness,
              boolean isFill)
        Construct a Circle with a center point, and its radius. Sets its color, thickness and if the circle is filled or not.
        Parameters:
        centre - (a Point) consisting of X and Y coordinates. This is the center of the circle.
        radius - (a non-negative integer) the radius of the circle
        color - (a Color object) the color of the circle
        thickness - (a non-negative integer) This determines with thickness of the border of the circle
        isFill - (a boolean) This determines whether to fill the circle with the chosen color
